edu.vserver.exercises.helpers
Class XMLHelper

java.lang.Object
  edu.vserver.exercises.helpers.XMLHelper

public final class XMLHelper
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides certain static-methods that are useful when implementing ExerciseXMLHandler.

Author:
Riku Haavisto

xmlToInputStream

public static java.io.InputStream xmlToInputStream(org.w3c.dom.Document doc)
                                            throws javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException,
                                                   javax.xml.transform.TransformerException,
                                                   javax.xml.transform.TransformerFactoryConfigurationError

Converts a Document to a InputStream that can be returned from #save(ExerciseData) save() [ eg. return XMLHelper.xmlToInputStream(document-containing-exer-data); ]

Parameters:
doc - Document to be converted to a stream
Returns:
InputStream generated from the Document
Throws:
javax.xml.transform.TransformerConfigurationException
javax.xml.transform.TransformerException

createEmptyDocument

public static org.w3c.dom.Document createEmptyDocument()
                                                throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
Creates and returns a newly created Document-object. This is quite usual start #save(ExerciseData) save() -method of an ExerciseXMLHandler-implementor.

Returns:
newly created empty Document-object
Throws:
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException

parseFromStream

public static org.w3c.dom.Document parseFromStream(java.io.InputStream inStream)
                                            throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                                   org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                                   java.io.IOException
Parses a Document from an InputStream containing one. This is quite usual start #load(InputStream) load()-method of an ExerciseXMLHandler-implementor.

Parameters:
inStream - InputStream from which to parse
Returns:
Document parsed from the input-stream
Throws:
javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
